description: Tonight we are introducing you to another hot recruit that Kaden found for his Kaden's Recruits series and this one is, in my opinion, hands down the best solo that Kaden has filmed so far.Chad is a real cutie and full of personality and I think that helps ease the whole situation and Kaden does his best job yet. Kaden met Chad at his local bar where he plays in a pool tournament every week. Usually Kaden doesn't recruit there, but he just couldn't resist Chad and Chad admits that he couldn't resist Kaden's invitation to show off in front of his camera.These two hit it off right from the start. Chad is a former Navy guy himself and that puts something immediately in common between the two. You can tell as soon as Chad starts talking to Kaden that he's come to please. And I'm sure by the time it's over you'll agree Chad is a real keeper for Kaden.Chad just got back from Japan while he was in the Navy, he's 25 years old, 5'10' and weighs about 165 lbs. Kaden doesn't have to do much work getting this stud naked because Chad is undressing while Kaden is asking the questions.By the time Kaden is finished with his questions all that's left is Chad's jeans and it doesn't take very long for those to come off. Chad does a quick look-around and then peels his jeans off and starts playing with his cock. Once that monster gets angry, it's impressive to say the least. He and Kaden have some good banter between them and by the time it's all over you'll wanna wrap Chad up in your arms and keep him. But, you'll have to fight Kaden to do that.
title: Chad, Scene #01
